channel.title: Emotes in methods
channel.description:
Ok, recently i've been thinking how to make the emote in a method work, before anthing else does.. Example:
When you die, you do the emote, then teleport..
But it doesn't work like that does it?..
The method is read correct? That's what makes it work... Or the spell is read. It just does all the things at once..
I've tried adding a timer n such, but still.. Doesn't work. Same with ice barrage, emote before GFX.
Does anyone know how this could be done?..[br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2007, 10:19:55 AM[/size][hr]Please, anyone?

item.title: Emotes in methods
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
